kpi.name: M5000C281

kpi_info.title: DROPPED MAC-D PDUS DUE TO OTHER REASON
kpi_info.use: Number of dropped MAC-d PDUs due to other reason. This counter includes PDUs of all sizes. UPDATED: When a MAC-d PDU is dropped because of other reason than maximum number of retransmissions or BTS buffer overflow.

kpi.kpi_alias: DROPPED MAC-D PDUS DUE TO OTHER REASON
